elements.name: Successful consent request creation (redirect)

steps.name: PSU wants to create a consent consent-dedicated-successful.json
PSU sends the create consent request
a successful response code and the appropriate consent response data is delivered to the PSU

elements.name: Successful consent request creation (redirect)

steps.name: PSU wants to create a consent consent-all-accounts-successful.json
PSU sends the create consent request
a successful response code and the appropriate consent response data is delivered to the PSU

elements.name: Failed consent request creation (redirect)

steps.name: PSU wants to create an erroful consent consent-dedicated-incorrect-iban.json
PSU sends the create consent request with error
an error response code is displayed and an appropriate error response is shown

elements.name: Request account list successfully

steps.name: PSU already has an existing valid consent account/accounts-create-consent.json
wants to get a list of accounts using accountList-successful.json
PSU requests the list of accounts
a successful response code and the appropriate list of accounts get returned

elements.name: Request account details successfully

steps.name: PSU already has an existing valid consent account/accounts-create-consent.json
wants to get account details using accountDetail-successful.json
PSU requests the account details
a successful response code and the appropriate details of accounts get returned

elements.name: Failed payment initiation request for single payments (redirect)

steps.name: PSU initiates an errorful single payment singlePayInit-incorrect-payment-product.json using the payment service payments and the payment product sepa-credit-trans
PSU sends the single payment initiating request with error
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

PSU sends the single payment initiating request with error

PSU sends the recurring payment initiating request with error

PSU sends the recurring payment initiating request with error

PSU sends the recurring payment initiating request with error

PSU sends the recurring payment initiating request with error
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

steps.name: PSU loads an errorful recurring payment recPayInit-no-ip-address.json using the payment service periodic-payments and the payment product sepa-credit-transfers
PSU sends the recurring payment initiating request with error
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

elements.name: Failed payment initiation request for recurring payments (redirect)

steps.name: PSU loads an errorful recurring payment recPayInit-wrong-format-psu-ip-address.json using the payment service periodic-payments and the payment product sepa-credit-transfers
PSU sends the recurring payment initiating request with error
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

elements.name: Successful payment status request

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU wants to request the payment status by using a set of data paymentStatus-RCVD-successful.json
PSU requests the status of the payment
a successful response code and the correct payment status is delivered to the PSU

elements.name: Failed payment status request

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU prepares the errorful payment status request data paymentStatus-no-request-id.json with the payment service payments
PSU requests the status of the payment with error
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

elements.name: Successful Single Payment Information Request

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU wants to request the payment information by using a set of data singlePayInformation-successful.json
PSU requests the information of the payment
a successful response code and the payment information is delivered to the PSU

elements.name: Failed Payment Information Request

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU prepares the errorful payment information request data singlePayInformation-no-request-id.json with the payment service payments
PSU requests the information of the payment with error
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

elements.name: Failed payment cancellation request

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU prepares the errorful cancellation request data paymentCancellation-no-request-id.json with the payment service payments
PSU initiates the cancellation of the payment with error
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

elements.name: Successful payment initiation request for single payments (embedded)

steps.name: PSU wants to initiate a single payment singlePayInit-successful.json using the payment service payments and the payment product sepa-credit-transfers
PSU sends the single payment initiating request
a successful response code and the appropriate authentication URL is delivered to the PSU

elements.name: Successful start of authorisation (embedded)

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU wants to start the authorisation using the authorisation data startAuth-successful.json
PSU sends the start authorisation request
PSU checks if a link is received and the SCA status is correct

elements.name: Failed start of authorisation (embedded)

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU prepares the errorful data startAuth-no-request-id.json with the payment service payments
PSU sends the errorful start authorisation request
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

elements.name: Successful update of identification data (embedded)

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU sends the start authorisation request and receives the authorisationId
PSU wants to update the resource with his identification data updateIdentificationNoSca-successful.json
PSU sends the update identification data request
PSU checks if the correct SCA status and response code is received

elements.name: Successful update of identification data (embedded)

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU sends the start authorisation request and receives the authorisationId
PSU wants to update the resource with his identification data updateIdentificationMultipleSca-successful.json
PSU sends the update identification data request
PSU checks if the correct SCA status and response code is received

elements.name: Errorful update of identification data (embedded)

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU sends the start authorisation request and receives the authorisationId
PSU prepares the errorful data updateIdentification-no-request-id.json with the payment service payments
PSU sends the errorful update authorisation data request
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

elements.name: Errorful selection of PSU sca method (embedded)

steps.name: PSU sends the single payment initiation request and receives the paymentId
PSU sends the start authorisation request and receives the authorisationId
PSU updates his identification data
PSU prepares the errorful data selectAuth-no-request-id.json with the payment service payments
PSU sends the errorful update authorisation data request
an error response code and the appropriate error response are received

elements.name: Successful payment initiation request for single payments (redirect)

steps.name: PSU wants to initiate a single payment singlePayInit-successful.json using the payment service payments and the payment product sepa-credit-transfers
PSU sends the single payment initiating request
a successful response code and the appropriate payment response data are received
a redirect URL is delivered to the PSU

steps.name: PSU wants to initiate a single payment singlePayInit-exceeding-amount.json using the payment service payments and the payment product sepa-credit-transfers
PSU sends the single payment initiating request
a successful response code and the appropriate payment response data are received
a redirect URL is delivered to the PSU

PSU sends the recurring payment initiating request
a successful response code and the appropriate payment response data are received
a redirect URL is delivered to the PSU

elements.name: Payment initiation request for recurring payments (redirect)

steps.name: PSU wants to initiate a recurring payment recPayInit-exceeding-amount.json using the payment service periodic-payments and the payment product sepa-credit-transfers
PSU sends the recurring payment initiating request
a successful response code and the appropriate payment response data are received
a redirect URL is delivered to the PSU
